entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DiagnosticDescriptor does not validate help link URI #59205
  • GeneratorDriverState and GeneratorState should be records #59199
  • Consider separating HideAdvancedMembers from CompletionOptions to a separate options struct #59197
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "checked operators" #59196
  • Consider negating options with non-default(T) default values #59195
    Backlog
  • Test plan for ref fields #59194
  • Test plan for pattern matching on `ReadOnlySpan<char>` #59191
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes for certain solution after setting net6.0 instead of net5.0 #59190
  • Event add-remove accessors references are not displayed in Find All References #59189

Closed

  • Test plan for Attributes on Main for top level programs #59193
  • Developers can move code with ease #58274
    Backlog
  • VBCSCompiler.exe Induces 11 GCs Every 30 Seconds When Not Handling Requests #44313

PullRequests

Created

  • Break out navigate-to specific index components into a separate index. #59206
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringsLiterals #59204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Do not use SyntaxWalker to visit an arbitrary syntax tree in order to avoid a stack overflow. #59203
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Features/rename_UI_rework Merge Main #59201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address a few param-nullchecking feedback items #59200
    Area-IDE
  • Update 3rd party usages that came in from json parsing. #59188
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Validate Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.Package on net6.0 #59187
    Area-IDE
  • Add minimal key option for GetDeterministicKey #59186
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Revert "Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options (#59083)" #59198
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record status for various features #59192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • Update paths in `.vscode/launch.json` due to TFM changes #59108
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE
  • Add refactoring to convert normal (or verbatim) strings to raw strings. #59180
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.1-beta1.22081.4 #59181
    Area-Infrastructure
